description.value: At 8th level, an order of the blossom cavalier learns to use the following spell-like abilities: @Compendium[pf1.spells.0324zq42g3fu4kko]{Animal Messenger}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.v3d3lnjj7ks0ztii]{Enthrall}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{Hideous Laughter}, and @Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{Suggestion}, with a caster level equal to his cavalier level. He can use these spell-like abilities a total of three times per day, in any combination (such as by casting @Compendium[pf1.spells.v3d3lnjj7ks0ztii]{Enthrall} three times, or @Compendium[pf1.spells.0324zq42g3fu4kko]{Animal Messenger} once and @Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{Suggestion} twice). The saving throw DC for these spell-like abilities is 10 + half the cavalierâ€™s level + his Charisma modifier. At 16th level, the cavalier can use his spell-like abilities seven times per day, and he adds @Compendium[pf1.spells.smbkd2yobhshbpqf]{Charm Monster} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.9avh63v2izqxldze]{Terrible Remorse} to the list.
